message: I believe in fairness too, but with the clock ticking, we should switch it up this time.
Time is on my side, let's settle this!
I'm willing to be flexible, but time is literally money Alice!  Let's meet in the middle.
Inflation is taking its toll, maybe it's time to reconsider?
Okay, Alice, let's stop this back and forth.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option now. Take it or leave it.
You should've taken one of my previous offers, now the deal is getting worse for you
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  I'm taking a hit from inflation, and we both lose if this fails. 48/52 is my final offer.
I'm not budging, you're running out of time and money
